metadata.title: CVE-2015-5335 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability inadmin/registration/register.php in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before2.7.11, 2.8.x before 2.8.9, and 2.9.x before 2.9.3 allows remote attackersto hijack the authentication of administrators for requests that sendstatistics to an arbitrary hub URL.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
